summary: Racemenu presets for all the members of doki doki literature club. Includes sayori, yuri, natsuki, and monika presets.
descriptionHtml:
Doki Doki Skyrim

Bring your favorite characters from Doki Doki Literature club into Skyrim with these racemenu
presets.  This mod requires the Racemenu mod to work, so please install that mod first.

Monika
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/89125/89125-1516601967-45176011.jpeg[/img]
Monika is the president of the literature club. She's the kind of girl that's great at pretty much everything. Her favorite hobbies are playing piano, writing poetry, and practicing her archery.

Sayori
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/89125/89125-1516602095-982399992.jpeg[/img]
Sayori is the vice president of the literature club. She can seem to be very outgoing and happy, but she has a side she keeps hidden.  Her hobbies are writing poetry and hanging out with her best friend.

Yuri
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/89125/89125-1516602109-2137067608.jpeg[/img]
Yuri is very shy and doesn't communicate well with people she doesn't know. She has a passion for reading and writing, and her favorite thing to collect is knives.

Natsuki
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/89125/89125-1516602087-1214171777.jpeg[/img]
Natuki is the youngest of the group. She is mostly known for her cuteness and love of manga. Her favorite hobbies are baking, reading manga, and writing poetry. She's a tough life, but she doesn't let it get her down.

To Install:
Extract into Skyrim's data folder

Mods I Used: 

[url=http://tes-game.ru/load/skyrim/kosmeticheskie_mody/11729/88-1-0-14480]Girl of the Innocence[/url] (skin textures)
[url=https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B8fvo3L3qhilY1pNQUQ0YkVIOWs/edit]SG Hairs
[/url][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/]SG Eyebrows[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75674/]Lind's Human Eyes[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/]UNP Body[/url] (NSFW)

Clothing mods:
Monika's outfit:  [url=http://mod.dysintropi.me/a-couple-of-conversions/]Hepsy's basic wear for UNPCM[/url] + ribbon from [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30977]Aerith dress mod[/url]
Yuri's outfit:  [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16658]UNP Simply Clothes[/url]  + gloves from [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17727/]osare gothic lolita[/url]
Sayori's outfit:   [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55900]Yurica Mage Dress[/url]
Natsuki's outfit:  [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17727/]Osare Gothic Lolita
[/url]
House used in pics:
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59543/]Silverpeak Lodge[/url] by Lanif
author: MissChevus
